GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
drm/i915/gem: add missing boundary check in vm_access

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 5f6e560e3e86ac053447524224e411034f41f5c7, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 9f909e215fea0652023b9ed09d3d7bfe10386423. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/i915/gem: add missing boundary check in vm_access
